mapper.select: select f.for_name, ifnull(count(stay.res_startdate),0) as count from forest f left join room r on r.for_no=f.for_no left join (select res.res_startdate, res.r_no from reservation res left join room r on res.r_no=r.r_no where res.res_his=3 and res.res_startdate like CONCAT(#{year}, "%")) stay on stay.r_no=r.r_no group by f.for_name;
